Comment: Look, two things can be true at the same time. Is it more than a coincidence that the administration would be in favor of a parade that lands on President Trump’s birthday - for sure.   Is it also downright intentionally ignorant to ignore and, for journalists, not report on the fact that it’s the Army’s 250th birthday? Also yes.   You don’t have to be a MAGA hat wearer just because you can recognize some basic facts.
